This was recommended to us as the "oldest restaurant in Barcelona." Conveniently just around the corner from our hotel, we walked over and waited for a table (reservation is recommended.)  Every table is named after a famous person that has dined there... ours was the "Lauren Bacall." My friend ordered the seafood soup (and didn't love it) and I ordered some sort of stuffed pasta (can't remember what they called it) and it was ok. The service was 5 star and the décor was beautiful!
